TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnReorderedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以取消事件，藉由設定屬性設`true`。The event can be canceled by setting the property to `true`. 不過，如果取消事件，則不會變更為值。However, if the event is cancelled, the will not change to the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
